data.title: William R. O'Donovan, "Thomas Eakins" (1892)
meta_keywords: pennsylvania academy of the fine arts
data.meta_description: William R. O'Donovan, "Thomas Eakins" (1892). Plaster, tinted pink, 11 x 6 5/8 x 4 3/8 in. (27.94 x 16.8275 x 11.1125 cm.). Charles Bregler's Thomas Eakins Collection, purchased with the partial support of the Pew Memorial Trust (1985.68.1.21). No known copyright restrictions.
data.meta_site_name: PAFA - Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts
